name: Healthy Peanut Butter Mousse
author: Sarah
summary: I whipped this up after school one day when I wanted peanut butter and a healthy snack. There are many other toppings that can be used with this such as Nutella®, extra peanut butter, granola, fruit, oats, graham crackers, cookies, or cereal. The possibilities are endless!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon stevia brown sugar blend
1 tablespoon chocolate chips, or to taste
directions: Microwave peanut butter in a microwave-safe bowl until liquid and smooth, about 20 seconds
Stir Greek yogurt into the peanut butter with a spoon until smooth, scraping off any peanut butter stuck to the spoon
Stir in stevia and vanilla extract
